Package io.jans.service.custom.script

Class CustomScriptManager

java.lang.Object
io.jans.service.custom.script.CustomScriptManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandaloneCustomScriptManager
@ApplicationScoped public class CustomScriptManager extends Object
Provides actual versions of scripts
Author:
Yuriy Movchan Date: 12/03/2014
